resources.string: Only popup emails from phone contacts
Only popup emails from starred contacts
Only popup emails when the keyguard is on

Author: Bao-Long Nguyen-Trong
 
 Email Popup is a simple utility that displays a short dialog every time an email is received.
 
 You can select how long the popup stays on and you can configure filtering so that only the emails important to you popup.
 
 Use Email Popup when you are working or studying by leaving your phone on your desk. Email Popup can also be used with the phone mounted on the car dashboard when driving. Finally, it is great to see incoming emails unnoticed during meetings.
 
 Email Popup only works with K-9 Mail v1.106 and higher. It does not work with Gmail unless you get your Gmail messages using K-9 Mail.
